metadata.description: Professional Rust development plugins: specialist agents with LSP integration and team orchestration with peer-to-peer communication

plugins.name: rust-agents
plugins.description: Comprehensive collection of specialized Rust development agents with Claude Code best practices. rust-analyzer LSP integration for real-time code intelligence. Full development lifecycle orchestration via rust-lifecycle skill. Handoff protocol via rust-agent-handoff skill for context sharing. Professional README generation with readme-generator. Async combinator patterns for elegant concurrent code. Updated for Rust Edition 2024 and modern tooling.

plugins.name: rust-team
plugins.description: Agent team orchestration for Rust development. Manages collaborative multi-agent workflows with peer-to-peer communication using Claude Code experimental agent teams. Requires rust-agents plugin for specialist agents.
